personal.name: Singamsetti Sriram
personal.title: Software Developer & AI Enthusiast
personal.tagline: Building scalable web apps with React, Python, and AI
personal.bio: Passionate CSE graduate with a strong foundation in full-stack development and AI technologies. I specialize in building scalable web applications using React and Python, with hands-on experience in machine learning and computer vision. I thrive on solving complex problems and creating intuitive user experiences.

projects.title: AI Resume Builder
projects.subtitle: InstantResumePro
projects.shortDesc: Intelligent resume creation platform with AI-powered content suggestions and smart formatting.
projects.problem: Job candidates struggle to create optimized, ATS-friendly resumes that effectively highlight their qualifications.
projects.solution: Built an AI-powered platform that analyzes job descriptions and suggests relevant content, optimizes formatting for ATS systems, and provides real-time feedback on resume quality.
projects.impact: Reduced resume creation time by 60% while improving relevance scores and pass-through rates on ATS systems.
highlights: AI-driven content suggestions based on job description analysis
Smart formatting engine optimized for ATS compatibility
Real-time feedback system with actionable improvement suggestions

projects.title: AI-Powered Image Encryption
projects.subtitle: Secure Image Processing
projects.shortDesc: Advanced image encryption system using ML-augmented cryptographic techniques.
projects.problem: Traditional image encryption methods lack the adaptability and security needed for modern threat landscapes.
projects.solution: Developed an ML-enhanced encryption pipeline that uses computer vision for pattern recognition and adaptive security measures, wrapped in an intuitive user interface.
projects.impact: Achieved 99.9% security rating while maintaining processing speeds under 2 seconds per image.
highlights: ML-augmented encryption pipeline with adaptive security levels
Pattern recognition for intelligent key management
User-friendly interface for complex cryptographic operations

projects.title: Real-Time Weather App
projects.subtitle: Live Weather Forecasting
projects.shortDesc: Responsive weather application with real-time forecasts and interactive maps.
projects.problem: Users need quick access to accurate, hyperlocal weather data with intuitive visualization.
projects.solution: Created a React-based weather app that aggregates multiple weather APIs, uses geolocation for precise forecasts, and presents data through interactive maps and charts.
projects.impact: Delivered sub-second load times with 95% forecast accuracy through multi-source data aggregation.
highlights: Multi-API aggregation for improved forecast accuracy
Interactive map visualization with responsive design

projects.title: Intelligent Password Generator
projects.subtitle: Security Tool
projects.shortDesc: Advanced password generation tool with entropy analysis and customizable security parameters.
projects.problem: Users create weak passwords that are vulnerable to brute-force attacks and common exploits.
projects.solution: Built a Java-based password generator with cryptographic libraries that analyzes entropy, checks against common patterns, and allows fine-grained customization of security parameters.
projects.impact: Generated passwords with 128+ bits of entropy, exceeding industry security standards.
highlights: Customizable parameters for length, character sets, and patterns
Real-time security feedback and breach database checking

experience.description: Developed full-stack applications using Spring Boot and Hibernate with responsive frontend interfaces.
achievements: Built RESTful APIs serving 10k+ daily requests
Implemented JPA repositories reducing database query time by 40%
Created responsive UIs with modern CSS frameworks

experience.description: Designed and implemented custom Salesforce solutions using Apex, LWC, and automation tools.
achievements: Developed custom Lightning Web Components improving user workflow efficiency by 30%
Automated business processes reducing manual data entry by 50%
Created Visualforce pages for complex data visualization

experience.description: Performed security assessments, vulnerability scanning, and penetration testing on web applications.
achievements: Conducted penetration tests on 15+ web applications
Prepared comprehensive security audit reports with remediation strategies
